snippet.title: Afterlove EP: Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming soon to PlayStation, Nintendo Switch and PC.

Afterlove EP is a slice-of-life adventure about love, loss and music. Explore modern Jakarta as Rama on his journey to find himself, reignite his creative spark and come to terms with the loss of his girlfriend Cinta, whose voice still lives on in his head.

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/cQVRmjMVPj

Wishlist the game now:
https://bit.ly/AfterloveEP_Steam 

Follow us on Twitter
@FellowTravellr
@Pixelnesia
